conbody.p: Requirements for quality assurance and quality assurance surveillance plans are in subpart 46.4 . The Government may either prepare the quality assurance surveillance plan or require the offerors to submit a proposed quality assurance surveillance plan for the Government’s consideration in development of the Government’s plan.
